description:
USN-3728-2 fixed several vulnerabilities in ClamAV. This update provides
the corresponding update for Ubuntu 12.04 ESM.

Original advisory details:

 Hanno Böck discovered that libmspack incorrectly handled certain CHM files.
 An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.
 (CVE-2018-14679, CVE-2018-14680)

 Jakub Wilk discovered that libmspack incorrectly handled certain KWAJ files.
 An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.
 (CVE-2018-14681)

 Dmitry Glavatskikh discovered that libmspack incorrectly certain CHM files.
 An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.
 (CVE-2018-14682)
title: ClamAV vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in ClamAV.
